briefTitle: Study of Lanreotide Autogel 120 mg in Patients With Non-functioning Entero- Pancreatic Endocrine Tumour
officialTitle: Open Label Extension Study of Lanreotide Autogel 120 mg in Patients With Non-functioning Entero-pancreatic Endocrine Tumour
summary: The primary purpose of this extension study was to assess the long term safety of patients with nonfunctioning enteropancreatic neuroendocrine tumour (NET), who were treated with open label lanreotide Autogel (120 mg every 28 days) and who participated in a previous study, 2-55-52030-726 (NCT00353496).

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Throughout the study until the completion/early discontinuation visit.
